definition[0]: to close and open one eye quickly to communicate something or show that something is a secret or joke
example[0]: He winked an eye at his companion.
definition[1]: to shine with a light that flashes on and off
example[2]: a Christmas tree with lights winking on and off
definition[2]: a quick action of closing and opening one eye, usually as a signal to someone else
example[4]: ‘You look tired, ’ he said with a knowing wink.
